Package eu.opends.niftyGui

Class KeyMappingGUIController

java.lang.Object
eu.opends.niftyGui.KeyMappingGUIController
All Implemented Interfaces:
de.lessvoid.nifty.screen.ScreenController
public class KeyMappingGUIController
extends java.lang.Object
implements de.lessvoid.nifty.screen.ScreenController
This class handles display and user interaction with the key mapping and graphic settings window generated by nifty-gui.
Author:
Rafael Math

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    KeyMappingGUIController​(SimulationBasics sim, KeyMappingGUI keyMappingGUI)
    Creates a new controller instance for the key mapping and graphic settings nifty-gui.

    Handler for "Apply"-button.
    void clickBackButton()
    Handler for "Back"-button.
    void onEndScreen()
    Will be called when GUI is closed.
    void onFullScreenCheckBoxStateChanged​(java.lang.String id, de.lessvoid.nifty.controls.CheckBoxStateChangedEvent event)
    When the status of the fullscreenCheckBox changes this method updates all drop down lists.
    void onResolutionDropDownChanged​(java.lang.String id, de.lessvoid.nifty.controls.DropDownSelectionChangedEvent<?> event)
    When the selection of the resolutionDropDown changes this method updates all drop down lists and stores the new selection.
    void onStartScreen()
    Will be called when GUI is started.

    • KeyMappingGUIController

      public KeyMappingGUIController​(SimulationBasics sim, KeyMappingGUI keyMappingGUI)
      Creates a new controller instance for the key mapping and graphic settings nifty-gui.
      Parameters:
      sim - Simulator.
      keyMappingGUI - Instance of the key mapping and graphic settings GUI.

    • clickBackButton

      public void clickBackButton()
      Handler for "Back"-button. This will close the GUI.

    • clickApplyButton

      public void clickApplyButton()
      Handler for "Apply"-button. This will apply the currently selected values from the graphic settings GUI to the simulator's settings.

    • onFullScreenCheckBoxStateChanged

      public void onFullScreenCheckBoxStateChanged​(java.lang.String id, de.lessvoid.nifty.controls.CheckBoxStateChangedEvent event)
      When the status of the fullscreenCheckBox changes this method updates all drop down lists.
      Parameters:
      id - ID of fullscreenCheckBox
      event - CheckBoxStateChangedEvent

    • onResolutionDropDownChanged

      public void onResolutionDropDownChanged​(java.lang.String id, de.lessvoid.nifty.controls.DropDownSelectionChangedEvent<?> event)
      When the selection of the resolutionDropDown changes this method updates all drop down lists and stores the new selection.
      Parameters:
      id - ID of resolutionDropDown
      event - DropDownSelectionChangedEvent
